God calls upon you to put all your strength into the work. You will have to render an account for the good you might have done had you been standing in a right position, but which you have failed to do. Oh, that you might see that it is time you were co-workers with Christ and the heavenly angels. Will you awake? There are souls in your midst who are in need of help. Have you felt a burden of soul to bring them to the cross? Bear in mind that just that degree of love you have for God you will reveal for your 


                                     -300- 

brethren, and for sinners who are lost and undone and out of Christ.--Ms 1, 1869, pp. 14, 15. ("Diligence in the Work of Preparation," March 26, 1869.)
